name: Hydrating Shampoo
description: A gentle, hydrating shampoo that cleanses while adding moisture to dry or damaged hair. Infused with argan oil and aloe vera for maximum hydration.
features: Lightweight water-resistant fabric
Reflective details for visibility
Ventilation panels for breathability
Zippered pockets for secure storage
Adjustable hood and cuffs

name: Volumizing Conditioner
description: Add body and bounce to fine or limp hair with this lightweight conditioner that detangles without weighing hair down.
features: Breathable mesh fabric for maximum airflow
Stretchy design for a full range of motion
Fast-drying material to keep you cool and dry
Sleeveless design for added freedom of movement
Ideal for gym sessions, running, or high-intensity activities

name: Repair Hair Mask
description: An intensive weekly treatment that repairs damaged hair, restores elasticity, and adds shine. Perfect for color-treated or heat-styled hair.
features: Breathable mesh fabric for maximum airflow
